name: Prizmit
description:
Prizmit is a simple, casual arcade game, where you have to time your hits very carefully. Tap the screen when the prism hits the green area, keep the combo up, get huge amounts of points, and keep going for as long as possible!

This game was put together in about 2-3 days, as such, it is a very small and simple game, but it's fun, challenging, and is a good time waster!
